CustomField.description: Indicates whether the submitted value matches the current value on Account/Opportunity.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( TEXT(PO_Needed__c) ) || ISBLANK( TEXT(Account__r.PO_Needed__c) ), "", IF( TEXT(PO_Needed__c) = TEXT(Account__r.PO_Needed__c), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") + " " + TEXT(Account__r.PO_Needed__c) ) )
CustomField.label: Match? - PO Needed?
